title: Smuggler's Cove
creator_credit: Andromeda Productions, Tom Broadbridge and Peter Sharp
brief_description: A day surfing for a group of teenagers turns into the adventure of a lifetime when they stumble across a group of cut-throat drug smugglers. Based on the novel, “Deadman’s float” by Roger Carr and starring Sally Boyden, Greg Rowe, Bill Hunter, Gus Mercurio, Ernie Sigley and Bunney Brooke.
